use_cases: ["Gene deletion design using genomic coordinates for ackA (SO 2915), pta (SO 2916), and gltS (SO3562) knockout constructs", "PCR primer design based on genomic sequences for amplifying upstream and downstream regions (~500 bp) of target genes", "Identification and amplification of acnB gene (455,782 to 458,378) for overexpression in itaconic acid production"]
